lead_paragraph: President Vladimir V. Putin’s decree stopped short of recognizing two breakaway provinces as independent states, but Ukraine said it would complicate peace negotiations.
snippet: President Vladimir V. Putin’s decree stopped short of recognizing two breakaway provinces as independent states, but Ukraine said it would complicate peace negotiations....

headline.main: Russia Will Accept Passports Issued by East Ukraine Separatists
headline.print_headline: Russia to Accept Passports  Issued by Ukraine Rebels
